TopicTitle: I like making custom flags for KSP missions. Here's a handful of them

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I make flags for Stratzenblitz75's KSP missions. If you don't know who that is, give his channel a visit, it's pretty cool: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTIgONilLxeAPqkiZrqZOzg

Today, I thought I'd share the flags I've made for his missions so you can use them too!

If you want to use them, go right ahead, no credit required. If you really want, I'd be happy to make a custom flag for your mission too.

Roman Mars's TED talk on flags influenced me a lot while making these. It's very entertaining and I recommend you check it out: https://www.ted.com/talks/roman_mars_why_city_flags_may_be_the_worst_designed_thing_you_ve_never_noticed?language=en
Pretty flags and nice videos. Last in the album is my favorite.
Wow! Can I use a few of these? These are great!

53 minutes ago, Andem said:

Wow! Can I use a few of these? These are great!

Yes, you can use as many as you want for whatever you want. And thank you!

Great flags, you have a real talent for this!

Have you ever seen "The Big Bang Theory" TV show? One of the characters has his own webshow on the show called "Fun With Flags." This made me think of that for some reason, check out some clips of it if you aren't familiar with it. It's pretty funny and somewhat informative.

Spoiler

 

By the way my favorite is by far the second to last one. The black-orange-yellow one. I'm definitely gonna start using that as my Career save flag!

Edited June 15, 2016 by Rocket In My Pocket

3 hours ago, Breadcrumbs92 said:

Roman Mars's TED talk on flags influenced me a lot while making these. It's very entertaining and I recommend you check it out: https://www.ted.com/talks/roman_mars_why_city_flags_may_be_the_worst_designed_thing_you_ve_never_noticed?language=en

 

11 minutes ago, Rocket In My Pocket said:

Have you ever seen "The Big Bang Theory" TV show? One of the characters has his own webshow on the show called "Fun With Flags." This made me think of that for some reason, check out some clips of it if you aren't familiar with it. It's pretty funny and somewhat informative.

What I find really funny is that this is exactly what we were doing in class today! Also, I learned that planet earth has a flag now! These flags are really cool! The stock flags are terrible. I just use the flag called "retro", and occasionally the R&D flag and C7 Aerospace flag.
